biotools.summary: OligoCalc calculates the physical properties of single- and double-stranded DNA and RNA molecules including melting temperature (multiple methods), concentration, molecular weight, and absorbance at 260 nanometers.  OligoCalc can also account for 5’ and 3’ chemical modifications and predict potential hairpin loop formation.
